questions.question: Do you think we're a little too hard on our robots in terms of the standards we apply?
If you put yourself in the shoes of a developer, would you use this kind of thing?
But why do you think Lisp has not had the mass adoption and success of languages like Python?
Did you imagine back then that the Internet would be as massively vibrant as it is today?
Put another way, what would impress you if you saw a computer do it these days?
And are we going to be able to react fast enough to deal with that?
And when I type a line of code, it should be able to say, did you mean such and such?
